EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Commercial Information Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your interest in SunPower Commercial Solar Solutions.
We want to offer you a simple solution for your business’s solar power needs.
Below is the information that we need from you to see if solar might be a good fit for your particular site. If it is determined that your facility is an ideal candidate for a solar installation, we will refer you to one of our authorized design/installation firms and they will assist you with the proposal process.
 Name:  Company / Business Name:  Industry:  Title:  Phone Number:  Email Address:  Preferred Contact Method/Time:  Address:  City:  State:  Zip Code:  Occupancy Type (Own / Lease):  Proposed PV System Site (Roof Site / Ground Site / New Carport / Existing Carport):  System Type (PowerTilt / PowerGuard / Commercial Panels / Not Sure):  Roof Type (Flat Roof / Pitched Roof / Metal Roof):  Building Height:  Shading (Are there any obstructions around the facility that may result to shading?):  Roof Age:  Roof Space (area sq-ft):  Utility:  kWh usage (Average per month or Total kWh usage for the last 12 months):  Time-frame – if you find our solar electric system to be cost effective and beneficial, how soon are you ready to go solar? (Less than 6 mos. / 6 mos. to 12 mos. / More than 12 mos.):  Funding (Yes/Needs Financing/No Answer):
When you have the information ready, kindly reply to this email and we will process your inquiry immediately.
Please feel free to call me or any member of the SunPower Customer Care Team at 1.800.SUNPOWER(1.800.7867693) if you need further assistance or you may visit our website at www.sunpowercorp.com for other information.
Thank you.
